message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special introductory price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than $150, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $180. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob! I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $152?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $158?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $150?
I'm not willing to go all the way back to $150, Bob. I'll meet you in the middle of our last two offers at $152.5, but that's as low as I can go
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $149?
